Posts.EditableText:
For those who love action, adventure and chilling out in thier brand new space cruiser. Astrum Aquilus is a brand new science-fiction roleplay forum free for all to play. Just go to [url=http://s15.invisionfree.com/AstrumAquilus/:tx33hsjd]Astrum Aquilus[/url:tx33hsjd] to join the fun.

Currently positions for race leaders, advisers and fleet leaders are open and everyone will be considered.

Peace be with you...
